item.title: Rural Villa in Dietikon
item.description: Province Germania Superior Province Description Location Dietikon Dietikon (Pleiades) Location Description Sublocation Sublocation Description Garden Rural Villa in Dietikon Keywords axial plan piscinae porticoes rural villas villae rusticae Garden Description This villa rustica complex was built on a site at the bottom of a valley near and parallel to the river Limmat. Dietikon was situated on an important land and water traffic route from the BÃ¼ndner Alps to Vindonissa and further north to the Rhine.
